name: AnalogKeyboard
keywords: AnalogKeyboard, hold, press, release, analog, keyboard, ESDeveloperBR, ESDeveloper, Eder Santini
description: Library developed by ESDeveloperBR that allows the operation of an analog keyboard with 5 keys, using only an analog GPIO. ATTENTION: The default settings for analog readings are set to 12Bits, a perfect setting for the ESP32.
